collectible.title: Ringo's apple
collectible.subtitle: She had a couple extra ones.
collectible.text: After the game ended Ringo realizes she was carrying a couple extra apples and gave one to everyone.
collectible.unlock: Make Ringo lose and finish the game.

collectible.title: Puyo Puyo 7?
collectible.subtitle: I think this is not the right version of the game.
collectible.text:
There are many worlds and many versions of stuff out there, this videogame box seems to come from a universe where the Puyo games were a bit... bolder...
(Credit to Colossal Eediot for the picture.)
collectible.unlock: Have Adrien (Cat Noir) help Ringo undress.
